verses.verse: <S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, he who does not <S%G1525>enter<s%> by the <S%G2374>door<s%> into the <S%G833>fold<s%> of the <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> but <S%G305>climbs<s%> up <S%G237>some<s%> <S%G237>other<s%> <S%G237>way,<s%> he is a <S%G2812>thief<s%> and a <S%G3027>robber.<s%>
"But he who <S%G1525>enters<s%> by the <S%G2374>door<s%> is a <S%G4166>shepherd<s%> of the <S%G4263>sheep.<s%>

"To him the <S%G2377>doorkeeper<s%> <S%G455>opens,<s%> and the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> his <S%G5456>voice,<s%> and he <S%G5455>calls<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> by <S%G3686>name,<s%> and <S%G1806>leads<s%> them out.

<S%G3752>"When<s%> he <S%G1544>puts<s%> <S%G1544>forth<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G2398>own,<s%> he <S%G4198>goes<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> them, and the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> him <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G3609>know<s%> his <S%G5456>voice.<s%>

"And a <S%G245>stranger<s%> they simply will not <S%G190>follow,<s%> but will <S%G5343>flee<s%> from him, <S%G3754>because<s%> they do not <S%G3609>know<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G245>strangers.<s%>"

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G3942>figure<s%> of <S%G3942>speech<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>spoke<s%> to them, but they did not <S%G1097>understand<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> those things were <S%G3739>which<s%> He had been <S%G2980>saying<s%> to them.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%> of the <S%G4263>sheep.<s%>
<S%G3956>"All<s%> <S%G3745>who<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> Me are <S%G2812>thieves<s%> and <S%G3027>robbers,<s%> but the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> did not <S%G191>hear<s%> them.

"I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2374>door;<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1525>enters<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> Me, he shall be <S%G4982>saved,<s%> and shall <S%G1525>go<s%> <S%G1831><s%> in and out, and <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3542>pasture.<s%>

"The <S%G2812>thief<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G3756>only<s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> to <S%G2813>steal,<s%> and <S%G2380>kill,<s%> and <S%G622>destroy;<s%> I <S%G2064>came<s%> that they might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> and might <S%G2192>have<s%> [it] <S%G4053>abundantly.<s%>
"I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd;<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd<s%> <S%G5087>lays<s%> <S%G5087>down<s%> His <S%G5590>life<s%> for the <S%G4263>sheep.<s%>

"He who is a <S%G3411>hireling,<s%> and not a <S%G4166>shepherd,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is not the <S%G2398>owner<s%> of the <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> <S%G2334>beholds<s%> the <S%G3074>wolf<s%> <S%G2064>coming,<s%> and <S%G863>leaves<s%> the <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> and <S%G5343>flees,<s%> and the <S%G3074>wolf<s%> <S%G726>snatches<s%> them, and <S%G4650>scatters<s%> [them.]
["He flees] <S%G3754>because<s%> he is a <S%G3411>hireling,<s%> and is not <S%G3199>concerned<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G4263>sheep.<s%>
"I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd;<s%> and I <S%G1097>know<s%> My <S%G1699>own,<s%> and My <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> Me,

<S%G2531>even<s%> as the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> Me and I <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> and I <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G5087>down<s%> My <S%G5590>life<s%> for the <S%G4263>sheep.<s%>

"And I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are not of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G833>fold;<s%> I <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G71>bring<s%> them <S%G2548>also,<s%> and they shall <S%G191>hear<s%> My <S%G5456>voice;<s%> and they shall <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4167>flock<s%> [with] <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd.<s%>

"For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> Me, <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G5087>down<s%> My <S%G5590>life<s%> that I may <S%G2983>take<s%> it <S%G3825>again.<s%>

<S%G3762>"No<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> has <S%G142>taken<s%> it <S%G142>away<s%> from Me, but I <S%G5087>lay<s%> it <S%G5087>down<s%> on My <S%G1683>own<s%> <S%G1683>initiative.<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G5087>lay<s%> it <S%G5087>down,<s%> and I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> it up <S%G3825>again.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> I <S%G2983>received<s%> from My <S%G3962>Father.<s%>"
There <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G4978>division<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words.<s%>
And <S%G4183>many<s%> of them were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G1140>demon<s%> and is <S%G3105>insane.<s%> <S%G5101>Why<s%> do you <S%G191>listen<s%> to Him?"

<S%G243>Others<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"These<s%> are not the <S%G4487>sayings<s%> of one <S%G99999>demon<s%> possessed. A demon cannot1410 3361 open455 the eyes3788 of the blind,5185 can he?"
At that <S%G5119>time<s%> the <S%G1456>Feast<s%> of the <S%G1456>Dedication<s%> <S%G1096>took<s%> <S%G1096>place<s%> at <S%G2414>Jerusalem;<s%>
it was <S%G5494>winter,<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G4043>walking<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple<s%> in the <S%G4745>portico<s%> of <S%G4672>Solomon.<s%>

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2944>gathered<s%> <S%G2944>around<s%> Him, and were <S%G3004>saying<s%> to Him, <S%G2193>"How<s%> <S%G2193>long<s%> <S%G4219><s%> will You <S%G142>keep<s%> us in <S%G5590>suspense<s%> <S%G142><s%>? <S%G1487>If<s%> You are the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> us <S%G3954>plainly.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, "I <S%G3004>told<s%> you, and you do not <S%G4100>believe;<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> that I <S%G4160>do<s%> in My Father's <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of Me.
" But you do not <S%G4100>believe,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you are not of My <S%G4263>sheep.<s%>
"My <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> My <S%G5456>voice,<s%> and I <S%G1097>know<s%> them, and they <S%G190>follow<s%> Me;

and I <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> to them, and they shall <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G622>perish;<s%> and <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> shall <S%G726>snatch<s%> them out of My <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

"My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> [them] to Me, is <S%G3173>greater<s%> than <S%G3956>all;<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G726>snatch<s%> [them] out of the Father's <S%G5495>hand.<s%>
" I and the <S%G3962>Father<s%> are <S%G1520>one.<s%>"
The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G941>took<s%> up <S%G3037>stones<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G3034>stone<s%> Him.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, "I <S%G1166>showed<s%> you <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> from the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> for <S%G4169>which<s%> of them are you <S%G3034>stoning<s%> Me?"

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> Him, "For a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> we do not <S%G3034>stone<s%> You, but for <S%G988>blasphemy;<s%> and <S%G3754>because<s%> You, <S%G1510>being<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4572>Yourself<s%> out [to be] <S%G2316>God.<s%>"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, "Has it not <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> in your <S%G3551>Law,<s%> 'I <S%G3004>said,<s%> you are <S%G2316>gods<s%>'?

<S%G1487>"If<s%> he <S%G3004>called<s%> them <S%G2316>gods,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> (and the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G3089>broken<s%>),

do you <S%G3004>say<s%> of Him, <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G37>sanctified<s%> and <S%G649>sent<s%> into the <S%G2889>world,<s%>' You are <S%G987>blaspheming,<s%>' <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>'?
<S%G1487>"If<s%> I do not <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> do not <S%G4100>believe<s%> Me;

but <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> them, <S%G2579>though<s%> you do not <S%G4100>believe<s%> Me, <S%G4100>believe<s%> the <S%G2041>works,<s%> that you may <S%G1097>know<s%> and <S%G1097>understand<s%> that the <S%G3962>Father<s%> is in Me, and I in the <S%G3962>Father.<s%> "
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> they were <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G4084>seize<s%> Him, and He <S%G1831>eluded<s%> their <S%G5495>grasp.<s%>

And He <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan<s%> to the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G907>baptizing,<s%> and He was <S%G3306>staying<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>

And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to Him and were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3303>"While<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G4160>performed<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G4592>sign,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> was <S%G227>true.<s%>"
And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> in Him <S%G1563>there.<s%>
